alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:31PM CDT until June 13 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Central Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Howard County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Arkinda, or 11 miles west of Horatio, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... De Queen, Dierks, Horatio, Lockesburg, Corinth, Center Point, Haworth, Silver Ridge, Cerrogordo, Geneva, Goodwater, Shinewell, Lebanon, Muddy Fork, Provo, West Line, Bellview, West Otis and Central. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
